mapper.update:
UPDATE `mqms_production` SET
`factory_code` = #{set.factoryCode},
`production_batch` = #{set.productionBatch},
`vin` = #{set.vin},
`mtoc` = #{set.mtoc},
`station_code` = #{set.stationCode},
`pass_time` = #{set.passTime},
`car_model_code` = #{set.carModelCode},
`car_model_name` = #{set.carModelName},
`production_worktime` = #{set.productionWorktime},
`egtype_code` = #{set.egtypeCode},
`transmission_code` = #{set.transmissionCode},
`car_level` = #{set.carLevel},
`period` = #{set.period},
`car_type` = #{set.carType},
`export_country` = #{set.exportCountry},
`short_code` = #{set.shortCode},
`eng_type` = #{set.engType},
`serial_code` = #{set.serialCode},
`districtName` = #{set.districtName},
`production_year` = #{set.productionYear},
`production_month` = #{set.productionMonth},
`transmission_short_code` = #{set.transmissionShortCode},
`transmission_simple_code` = #{set.transmissionSimpleCode},
`transmission_type` = #{set.transmissionType},
`car_short_code` = #{set.carShortCode},
`car_model` = #{set.carModel},
`car_simple_code` = #{set.carSimpleCode},
`production_id` in
#{item} and
`production_id` >= #{where.productionIdSt} and
`production_id` <= #{where.productionIdEd} and
`factory_code` in
#{item} and
(
`Factory_code` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Factory_code` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
